headline: Lam Research Reshapes Leadership And Partnerships For Next Generation Chip Demand
summary: Lam Research announced a set of senior leadership changes, including the retirement of its COO and the appointment of Sesha Varadarajan to the role. The company added Dr. Anirudh Devgan, a key figure in electronic design automation, to its board of directors. Lam also entered a multi year partnership with CEA Leti to work on advanced specialty technology devices and semiconductor materials. For investors watching NasdaqGS:LRCX, these leadership and partnership moves come on top of a share...
